00037 /* @enum BOUNDARY_LOCATION_IDX
00038  *
00039  * The boundary location index is used to indicate which boundaries 
00040  * should have the specified boundary condition imposed.  The 
00041  * following conventions are used for the boundary location index:
00042  *
00043  *
00044  * 2D
00045  * --
00046  *  - x_lo:           0
00047  *  - x_hi:           1
00048  *  - y_lo:           2
00049  *  - y_hi:           3
00050  *  - x_lo and x_hi:  6
00051  *  - y_lo and y_hi:  7
00052  *  - all boundaries: 9
00053  *
00054  *
00055  * 3D
00056  * --
00057  *
00058  *  - x_lo:           0
00059  *  - x_hi:           1
00060  *  - y_lo:           2
00061  *  - y_hi:           3
00062  *  - z_lo:           4
00063  *  - z_hi:           5
00064  *  - x_lo and x_hi:  6
00065  *  - y_lo and y_hi:  7
00066  *  - z_lo and z_hi:  8
00067  *  - all boundaries: 9
00068  * 
00069  */
00070 typedef enum {
00071   X_LO           = 0,
00072   X_HI           = 1,
00073   Y_LO           = 2,
00074   Y_HI           = 3,
00075   Z_LO           = 4,
00076   Z_HI           = 5,
00077   X_LO_AND_X_HI  = 6,
00078   Y_LO_AND_Y_HI  = 7,
00079   Z_LO_AND_Z_HI  = 8,
00080   ALL_BOUNDARIES = 9} BOUNDARY_LOCATION_IDX;
